title: Localization key field cannot be left blank when adding.
description: When attempting to add a localization key without entering any value into the key field, the externalized text fails to be displayed in the chart's title.
OB: When a localization key is left blank in the properties file, but a valid value is provided for it, the externalized text fails to appear in the chart's title.
EB: When a localization key is left blank in the properties file, but a valid value is provided for it, the externalized text should appear in the chart's title.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Open the properties file. 2. Leave the key field blank, but provide a valid value for it. 3. Check if the externalized text is displayed in the chart's title.
